website_summaries.verdict: The Jack Wolfskin Vojo Hike 2 is well-touted for its durable construction, cushiony support, and impressive lightness. These qualities make the boot perfect for day hikes and light walking. Many customers applaud this robust hiking shoe because it’s comfortable to wear and it doesn’t require a lot of breaking in. The only downside is that it runs a bit narrow for some. Taking into account its budget-friendly price, this hiking boot from Jack Wolfskin is a great boot overall.
pros: The Jack Wolfskin Vojo Hike 2 Texapore Mid has received high marks for being super comfortable
Some buyers are glad that the shoe only needs a little break-in period
An expert reviewer says it’s a good option for light walking and day hikes
One reviewer notes that the Jack Wolfskin Vojo hiker has an excellent grip on rocks and also navigates deep sand well
These Jack Wolfskin shoes have also gotten 5-star reviews for its reliable arch support
A customer who has used the shoe for horse training is impressed by its lightness
Nearly everyone has good words to say about the overall quality of the shoes
cons: Some reviewers say that the shoe runs narrow

customer_reviews.title: The soles are crap.
customer_reviews.text: The soles have worn away very quickly on side of the boots. Making them extremely uncomfortable to walk in. Absolutely no durability. Frankly I'd like a refund from the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Jangus

customer_reviews.title: I wish Britain my boat is good in this country I will certainly buy them
customer_reviews.text: There’s a lot of negative reviews about those boots however I found them to be excellent in construction souls are good grip is excellent I do need some bedding in as they are slightly cardboard like which has been mentioned before however they were worth the money as with everything made in China just be careful on the size nines or nine which is what I purchased and they fit perfectly bit snug but allow room for wear And they will fit great excellent product can’t complain just wish Britain my boots like these
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, warm and dry.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent waterproof boots. I bought mine for standing in the rain on muddy fields watching my son play football. I highly recommend these. They are warm, dry and comfortable with strong ankle support and great grip.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Nation

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and waterproof but not very comfy
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very waterproof (after struggling to find proper waterproof boots!) but sadly the inner sole is very hard and therefore I had to return due to this. They are a perfect fit for sizing and so couldn't wear a cushioned innersole. It's a shame and very unexpected with Jack Wolfskin as otherwise they are fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Izziecat

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Felt a bit snug at first, but love them now. I've had them about 5 months I think. Cleaned them and proofed them and I'm still not getting wet feet walking the dog in this weather. I do about 5+ miles a day with my Spinone and they are just showing signs of use across the toes.
customer_reviews.author: J Moore

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable straight out of the box
customer_reviews.text: The fit is correct for my size. I normally take a size 9.5 (UK) shoe so that's what I ordered and they are a great fit. I also ordered the socks that came up on Amazon as a suggestion, and they are also very comfy. I have just walked and jogged up a hill on moorland near my home and the boots feel great! So I would agree with other reviewers these are well worth the money. Its dry currently so I can't vouch for waterproof claims.
customer_reviews.author: Young Mr Grace

customer_reviews.title: Fingers crossed
customer_reviews.text: Hi. I really love these boots but they are just too small for me. I am usually a 10 and purchased a 10 as per the advice. But they are just too tight on me. The only trouble is that i had no option but to wear them on a walk for a few hours thinking that they would give a little but unfortunately they didn’t and that made them uncomfortable for me. I realise that I’m in an unfortunate position now but don’t want to waste my money or lose these great boots. Would it be possible for me to swap them for a 10.5? Many thanks
customer_reviews.author: phillou

customer_reviews.title: Great, but..
customer_reviews.text: Tested these out on the Yorkshire Three Peaks challenge. Definitely not the comfiest of shoes but they survived in various conditions and kept my feet warm and dry. Even with insoles they aren’t to comfy so bare that in mind if your planning on using these for long distance walks.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Not Waterproof, terrible sole
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a pair of Jack Wolfskin boots previously and they lasted 8 years before the stitching started to fail. The problem with these particular boots is the fact that they are NOT waterproof. After a few weeks of light use, both boots are leaking. The sole is not really suitable for abything other that lowland walks, being too flexible and far to thin. You will feel every stone that you walk on and risk slipping on anything wet.
customer_reviews.author: J Price

customer_reviews.title: Good boots.
customer_reviews.text: Having previously purchased a pair of walking shoes I took the step of buying these for winter purposes and walking the dog. Great buy and well pleased at this time. Longevity of product remains to be seen.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Ward

customer_reviews.title: Quality Boots
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that they are waterproof as I washed the car with them on using a hose. Also they were really comfortable, a big improvement on the last ones. Good boots for leisure walks in bad weather - happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jambo25

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: From the box to the foot and out into the rain. Kept feet dry and are relatively comfortable, just need to get the lace tension sorted. Very true fitting, so suggest if you want to put thick socks on go up a half a size. Other wise they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Munick

customer_reviews.title: Comes up small
customer_reviews.text: First of all, let me say that I think this product is brilliant. I ordered the high rise shoe as I already have the shoe and find them ultra comfortable, light and easy to wear on a long walk. I ordered the high shoe in the same size believing that it would fit, (well you would wouldn't you) but the high rise shoe was too small. As such, I would suggest you order a half size bigger than your normal shoes size.
customer_reviews.author: COLIN N.

customer_reviews.title: good fit
customer_reviews.text: I am neve sure if a shoe/boot will fit, to allow my big toes movement, a touch (lots) of ingrowing big toe nail trouble. some size 6 are loose fit, so I went for a 7, fits well round the foot, with enough toe room for me. Good sole tread, and water proof. Will do me.
customer_reviews.author: david burrell

customer_reviews.title: These boots are made for walking
customer_reviews.text: Came in good time and well packed well made very comfortable I was very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Mr Bear

customer_reviews.title: Great for trekking in New Zealand
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable fit, though slightly big if you have skinny legs like me. Walked all around New Zealand for 3 weeks, including some long 6 hour hikes, boots were comfortable and breathable throughout. Sprayed my own waterproof spray on them before use and so far dry!
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, waterproof and comfortable - didn’t need breaking in at all. Used straight from the box; fit was as expected. Feel sturdy and well made. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These unfortunately are NOT waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: These would get 5 Stars normally. Super comfortable , light , look great just with jeans “BUT” they failed the waterproof test. Just long wet grass was enough to give me damp feet. Unfortunately not for purpose. They are going back.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Gr Knight

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Nice comfortable boot and very cheap considering the brand and the quality of manufacture.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Tottman

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: They’re quite narrow fitting so ordered a size bigger. The man I bought them for is delighted with them. Very comfortable and exactly what he wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Leeann

customer_reviews.title: After the miles I’m hoping for smiles!!
customer_reviews.text: I have gone for half a size bigger than I normally take in footwear hoping this is a wise choice!!! Time will tell 🤞🏻
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: The boot is of very narrow in depth and very uncomfortable pressing on the top of my foot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable walking boot!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has bunions and a fracture in his foot. We ordered his size 15 shoes and he says they are the best fitting, most comfortable and useable he has had ever!
customer_reviews.author: Gill

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product. Fits well. Great for using when hill-walking
customer_reviews.author: Gingerferret

customer_reviews.title: Not so waterproof boots.
customer_reviews.text: Fit is good. Not very waterproof walked through long grass and feet where soaked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy boots recommended
customer_reviews.text: Was able to wear straight from the box, bo need for wearing in. Once quality..
customer_reviews.author: LIAM W

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit and would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Liked that they were comfortable from the start, I hiked about 15 miles so far and no blisters !!!!
customer_reviews.author: S C.

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best pair of walking boots I've ever purchased.
customer_reviews.text: Fit comfortably, sturdy, hardy and generally just a fantastic buy for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Maru

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Took these boots from the box to a two day outdoor activity trip. Amazed how comfortable they were even after 10 hours
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boot so far
customer_reviews.text: Boots fit well, very comfortable. Walked 5miles on day of delivery in 30c, feet were not sweaty and very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Tom Bates

customer_reviews.title: It’s comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It’s light and comfortable but the stitching could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and waterproof what more could you ask for.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband at Christmas and he’s chuffed with them says they are super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made a little snug for the wider foot with a high instep.
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as wide as one would have liked. Hopefully will stretch a little. Nice looking boot.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof & comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.text: Would prefer a wider fit, so had to have one size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: ALAN G.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Fit & looked as aspected. Fast delivery, good communication & a pleasure to deal with
customer_reviews.author: R M Dickson

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this items(product)..i used this for hiking/mounting climbing.
customer_reviews.author: Jerson A. Salidaga

customer_reviews.title: A quality product, and value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money, use them for hill walking, really comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: I love my boots
customer_reviews.text: A very well made Boot with excellent finish all round.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: The boots are great did 7 mile walk in them feet were dry and no blisters
customer_reviews.author: Richard charlesworth

product_meta.title: Jack Wolfskin Men's Vojo Hike 2 Texapore Mid M Wasserdicht High Rise Shoes
product_meta.description: The Jack Wolfskin Kids MTN Attack 3 Mid Boots are perfect for exploring the great outdoors, protecting toes the whole way. These boots utilise Texapore technology, a waterproof, windproof and breathable fabric designed to offer complete weather protection while being highly durable. The breathable nature of the fabric allows moisture vapour to escape, ensuring you stay comfortable and dry in the wettest of conditions. The fabric is completely windproof which keeps cold winds at bay and eliminates windchill. These boots also feature water resistant synthetic upper material and water resistant, robust textile fabric; CIRCULINER ACTIVE: extra breathable, fast drying polyester lining; WOLF HIKE PRIME K: flexible children’s hiking sole with comfortable cushioning and good grip; MULTIFUNCTIONAL GRIP SYSTEM: special tread pattern for multifunctional application and protective heel and toe caps.
feature_bullets: Hiking Boot For Day Hikes/ Waterproof, Breathable/ Flexible And Lightweight Hiking Sole
Activity Index: A (Hiking)/ Water Resistant, Robust Textile Fabric And Water Resistant, Robust Suede Leather
Texapore: Waterproof, Breathable Membrane/ Circuliner Active: Extra Breathable, Fast Drying Polyester Lining
Traction: Flexible, Lightweight Hiking Sole With Good Cushioning, Designed For Easy Hikes
